name: Dondozo
flavorText: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

previous.name: Veluza
previous.flavorText: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.

next.name: Tatsugiri
next.flavorText: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

pokemon.name: Dondozo
pokemon.flavorText: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.
